name: fix_the_meerkat function function verification
description:
Testing fix_the_meerkat function with various test data [with arr=['ground', 'rainbow', 'sky'], expected=['sky', 'rainbow', 'ground']].

        You will be given an array which will have
        three values (tail, body, head).
        It is your job to re-arrange the array so
        that the animal is the right way round
        (head, body, tail).
        :return:
descriptionHtml:
Codewars badge:

Test Description:

Save the animals by switching them back. You will be given an array which will have three values (tail, body, head). It is your job to re-arrange the array so that the animal is the right way round (head, body, tail).

steps.name: Enter test data: ['ground', 'rainbow', 'sky'] and assert actual result: ['sky', 'rainbow', 'ground'] vs expected: ['sky', 'rainbow', 'ground']

labels.value: My head is at the wrong end!
